name: The Rotation Maneuver
description:
The Triangle Confederation has been attacked by the merciless forces of trigonometry.

It is your job, as Great Triangular Commander, to defend the most sacred Triangle Center Point from their cold, methodical eyes.

Every flank is strong against one of the trigonometry special forces (SIN, COS and TAN) and weak against the two others.

Present the right flank (color) in front of the right enemy to defeat them and gain points!

The game ends when the center has been reached, which, well, will happen. History has already been written.

Made with Godot for the Trijam#111 in 3 hours

Controls

* rotate clockwise : right arrow, controller button2, right click (pressed)

* rotate counter-clockwise : left arrow, controller button 1, left click (pressed)

The inputs can be a bit laggy in the browser. For an optimal experience, please download the executable version!

Credits

The cover image/game over font is Secuela.
